summary:
Outpatient pharmacy supervisor reports Veteran A returned medications to a distant CBOC today. Veteran A reported that upon discharge last night, nurses gave
him his own discharge medications as well as the discharge medications of Veteran B. When Veteran A realized after discharge that he had someone else's
medications, and returned them to a CBOC near his home today. Because of his home location, they were returned to a CBOC belonging to a different VA Medical
Center and are being shipped back to PVAHCS Pharmacy, but are recovered to VA custody. Further remediation to follow.

victim.victim_id: United States Department of Veterans Affairs
